item.title: Markdown & metadata
item.description: In Infusion everything is documented using markdown, as a “pattern”. To create a new pattern file, just add a file with the .md extension to the content/patterns folder. It’s recommended you use “kebab case” to name the file (words separated by hyphens). For example, a pattern with the title “Menu button” should probably have the filename menu-button. Then you get a nice clean URL: username.github.io/your-library/patterns/menu-button. If you’re not familiar with writing markdown, there are a number of tutorials available.
